text: Abraham li Sarah intarjei innum, Inmani'n11:11. Inmani'n; manuscripts lekkhat in Sarah khan ajuotarra sakanei sik emak jei innum ngamna khan nai kha ahongwon. Ama  Pathian chong-inkhitna hi atung ngersik eii tihi inngamna jarra, ngamna khan Abraham hi pa inkhat ahong emator. Inphut 18:11-14; 21:2
